alert.note: Alert for Clay; Lincoln; Turner; Union; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 1:15AM MDT until June 14 at 1:45AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clay County in southeastern South Dakota... Southwestern Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... Eastern Yankton County in southeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Turner County in southeastern South Dakota... Northwestern Union County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 215 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wynot, or 10 miles southeast of Yankton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Meckling and Volin around 225 AM CDT. Irene and Wakonda around 235 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Beresford and Centerville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
